tool_description: Douyin No Watermark Video Downloader https://t.me/manhict #douyin #video #music #user #feed #scrapper #grabber  Extract video data Chinese Douyin(抖音). Using this API, you can get the following:  No Watermark Video Url With Watermark Video Url Music Mp3 Url, Music Title, Music Cover… Video Author, Video Title, Video Cover… Video Hashtags Video Duration, Video Share Url…
name: Douyin Media No Watermark
title: Douyin Media No Watermark

api_list.name: getUserPost Limit
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://douyin-media-no-watermark1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/social/douyin/user/itemlist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "douyin-media-no-watermark1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
